extendedInfo.description: Paid version of Receipt Filer Lite, popular receipt and expense management software. Featured on Laptop Magazine.* Import data from Receipt Filer Lite.* subtotal and tax* Export/Import data and pictures* Zoom in/out pictureStatus: Fixed picture rotate crash on Droid.tested with NexusOne!

reviews.comment: Love! Works perfectly on Moto DROID. Convenient for tracking all cash spending. Don\'t have to keep paper receipts now. Quick with the picture feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Camera doesn\'t work with Samsung Charge. Would also be nice if it had a bank deposit aspect as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: View Picture -> Unable to find item?
reviews.comment: On the Samsung Note II, when I click \"View Picture\", I receive a message that says \"Unable to find item\".  This app used to work perfectly on my Evo.  Does this means it is not totally compatible with the Note II?  Thanks,  JG
reviews.author: Jon Gall

reviews.comment: Nice easy app. Would be great if you could add mileage then it would be a one stop shop for business receipts. Thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hitone
reviews.comment: Great app love it got gold needs date to date with Sep category & password. Although its so easy to use quickly a password might slow you down. HH just changed to HTC sence photosdid not load on app. Would be gold if you can put earning and ballance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice and simple. Use it daily! Need description field to show in reports. Sprint HTC 2.2 evo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Not a bad app, but I use it on a Motorola XOOM and it only appears on a quarter of the page. Would be good if it sized to the full screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Will take picture in T-mobile vibrant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this application. However, it does not work with the camera on my Nexus S. Nor does it allow me to delete businesses or categories.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung S4
reviews.comment: Love the app, have been using it for years but the camera doesn\'t work on my new Samsung S4 :(
reviews.author: Woody Randel

reviews.comment: Good app, but I wish it was easy to see the reports in computer After saving in Android, you still need to spend good time organizing them again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs a milage and hour tracker to be a 5 star app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app.I use this to prove in court that I buy everything for my son,NOT his mother; Please add \"delete\" option in Receipt Category.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great app!  My only request is to have way to group or sort receipts. How about editable folders instead of years in summary?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app. Please can you add features for - mark item submitted for claim and then as paid (batch) - email receipt pictures - Multi photos per item
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, but does need more features. Need to be able to edit category names. Menu items would be helpful also.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finally! I told you I would buy it if you add stuff to it! You did and here you go! Thats awesome app, space saver!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty good app, works as advertized but i was looking for better tracking features. Need the ability to add keywords and to search them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For some reason when I export to . Csv file and open in excel or notepad...it is all garbled words and makes no sense. Any thoughts?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Loved it until my phone crashed and now i have no option of importing all the receipts back. Please help me here.
reviews.author: A Google User
